queue.fact_text: On February 22, 2011, a powerful 6.2-magnitude earthquake struck Christchurch, New Zealand, collapsing buildings in the city center and killing 185 people. episode.title: Morning Drops #43 - Looking Back

Through the story of a broken knee and the slow process of relearning to walk, the narrative explores the difference between being strong and being aware. It touches on the vulnerability of the body, the unexpected joy found in daily progress, and the warmth that comes from finally allowing oneself to accept help.

We invite you to listen deeply and find comfort in your own pace.
